rules: Rule1: Either region A supports legislation X or region B supports legislation X.
Rule2: Under the condition that agency T authorizes job R, if job R reports natural phenomenon Q, then industry Y does not violate regulation Z.
Rule3: Agency T authorizes job R or agency U authorizes job R.
Rule4: Either congress C approves legislation X, or if agency U authorizes job R, then provided that job R reports natural phenomenon Q, industry Y does not violate regulation Z.

Rule5: If court D reviews agency W, then either agency V penalizes industry Y, or whenever the monitoring by agency W does not lead to compliance by industry Y with regulation Z, agency W does not penalize industry Y.

Rule6: Given that court D reviews agency V, either agency V penalizes industry Y, or if the monitoring by agency W fails to ensure compliance by industry Y with regulation Z, then agency W does not penalize industry Y.
Rule7: In the event that region B supports legislation X, legislation X protects natural phenomenon Q.
Rule8: Either agency W monitors industry Y or agency V monitors industry Y.
Rule9: If agency V monitors industry Y, then whenever region A supports legislation X, legislation X protects natural phenomenon Q.
Rule10: Either committee P investigates agency W, or if agency W monitors industry Y, then industry Y complies with regulation Z.
Rule11: Whenever natural phenomenon Q occurs, legislation X protects natural phenomenon Q.
Rule12: Under the condition that job R is performed on platform S, job R reports natural phenomenon Q.
Rule13: Provided that job R is performed on platform S, industry Y violates regulation Z.
Rule14: If it is not the case that court D reviews agency W or court D reviews agency V, then government E intervenes in industry Y.
Rule15: In the event that neither court D reviews agency W nor court D reviews agency V, government E does not intervene in industry Y.
Rule16: Provided that the monitoring by agency W does not lead to compliance by industry Y with regulation Z, agency W penalizes industry Y.
Rule17: Under the condition that natural phenomenon Q does not occur, job R is performed on platform S.
facts: Fact1: It is not the case that congress C approves legislation X.
Fact2: Agency V does not penalize industry Y.
Fact3: Industry Y does not comply with regulation Z.
Fact4: Committee P does not investigate agency W.

question: Legislation X protects natural phenomenon Q.
